overview: The project involves modifying a counter application to implement a larger increment value, changing from +1 to +1009 per increment operation while maintaining the existing architecture.
key_events: Interface documentation updated to reflect new increment value
system_responses: Proposed updates to handle larger numbers in UI
Identified necessary test and documentation updates
current_state: The system is being updated to handle larger increment values (1009) with planned modifications to the HomeViewModel, UI display, and testing suite while maintaining the existing Stacked architecture.
